div.div: A project of Kansas House Leadership

div.p: Welcome to our Kansas COVID-19 Resource Center. This site is intended to be a one-stop resource for Kansas families and business owners seeking quick access to the information and tools they need to navigate and mitigate the impact of coronavirus in our state.
In collaboration with our Governor, the Legislature, community leaders and Kansans all across this state, we are partners in protecting the health and safety and future of the people of Kansas.

div.a: See The Latest # of Cases By County

figure.blockquote: We’re going to get through this as we have time and time and time again in this state – together as Kansans. Now is not a time for partisanship. It’s not a time for politics. Now is the time to reach out for compromise, cooperation, collaboration. To reach out together, for each other and to the stars through difficulties. Ad Astra Per Aspera. God will bless this state and its people.
figure.figcaption: — Speaker Pro Tem Blaine Finch, March 19, 2020
